page.title: 12SPORT IN EPPERSTONE
page.content: Epperstone is fortunate in owning its own{cricket ground.}Weekly matches are played(on Sundays) and there are also matches played by the Police Cadets in the Manor grounds. A{rifle range}lies by the Gonalston Road and is used by the East Bridgford Rifle Club,also for Police training. The South Notts.Hunt Kennels are to the west of the village,the{hounds}are often to be met in the close season being exercised through the village. The British Horse Society,Pony Club, Sheep Dog Society and the South Notts. Hunt all use "The Cross Keys Inn"for their meetings.{Gymkhanas}are held from time to time at local farms. There is a{Clay Pigeon}shoot,and frequent road trials by the Nottingham Clarion and other{cycle}clubs.
